111.content: So! Whose gonna tickle Ol' Percy?
111.title: Who gets to tickle Percy?

1111.content:
{This story takes place during the second book, but during a day that was before they went on their mission.

It was a normal day at Camp Half Blood, except that Mr. D and Chiron had decided to add a new class to the camp.
"What!? Why does there have to be a class! This isn't shcool!" Percy shouted as he and Annabeth headed to a new building.
"Well I think its a good idea," Annabeth argued, "Besides we're not going to be graded or have homework."
"I guess that's good..." Percy grumbled as they walked through the door.
"Hello! My name is Silver and I will be running this class!" A guy exclaimed.
He was about six feet and had black hair that was tinted with silver. He wore a black robe, with a silver shirt under it and black jeans.
"You're our teacher!? You can't be any older than fifteen!" Annabeth shouted.
Silver glared at her.
"I'M NOT FIFTEEN! I'M OVER 5000!" Silver shouted back at her.
"Oh... you're a god..." Annabeth realized, looking down.
"Yeah, sorry about that. That's just a little pet peeve of mine," Silver replied, "Anyway, now that everyone is here we can finally start the cla... Yes, Percy?"
Percy lowered his hand and said, "What are you the god of?"
"Hope and light, but anyway today we're going to be talking about our flaws, both mental and physical...

After class

"Wow... that took forever..." Percy moaned.
"Yeah, but Silver wasn't kinda cool," Annabeth replied.
"Yeah, I guess..." Percy said.
"So, Percy, what do you think your physical flaw is?" Annabeth asked as they walked into Percy's cabin.
"I dunno," Percy shrugged sitting down on the bed next Annabeth.
"Ah come on! You've gotta have some guess!" Annabeth argued poking him in the side.
"AAH!" Percy shrieked, jumping up and hitting his head on the top bunk, "Ow! That hurt!"
"You're ticklish!" Annabeth gasped.
"What!? N-no I'm not!" Percy replied, standing up and backing away slowly.
"Are too! And I'll prove it!" Annabeth yelled.
1111.title: The New Class

No Im n-not I just don't like to be tickled thats all.Percy tried to sound brave.Well to bad!Said annabeth excitedly.NooooddddoooonnnntdootthhhhattHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHASSSSSSSSTTTTTTTTTTTTOO OOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPIIIIIIIIIIIITTTTTTTTTT!Why does it tickle to much.Said Annabeth digging into his sides.

1112.content: Percy was walking into his small house which Posideon, his father, had given him. He laid down on his bed, still wearing his shoes and fell asleep. Luke walked over to the small hut, and noticed the sleeping Percy. Luke was still angry with Percy for snitching that he had stolen the Lightning Bolt, he had heard Percy was the most ticklish guy at Camp Half Blood, so he went back to his cabin, and grabbed his comb, his electric toothbrush, some rope, ductape, and a pair of scissors. He ran back to the cottage and slowly walked over to Percy. He took Percy's lamp and knocked it on his head. Percy winced, opened his eyes, then fell unconsious. Luke cut off Percy's levi skinny jeans, his tight Volcom t-shirt, leaving Percy's boxers on, thinking to himself, "I'm not gay!" and looking at Percy's feet, left his black high tops on. He then tied Percy's wrists together, and pulled them over his head, and tied them to the board of Percy's bed. Then he took Percy's ankles and tied them to either sideof the bed, just above the high top end so that they would be easily slid off. Luke then took off his DC sneakers and took his underarmor sock, and put it in Percy's mouth, and wrapped ducttape around Percy's mouth. With his barefoot, he used his toes in Percy's armpits to lightly tickle the tied boy awake.
1112.title: Luke tickles Percy

11121.content: Percy wakes up, slightly giggling, and moves around when he realizes who tied him up, and that he has scissors. "Don't worry Percy, I heard from a little birdie, Annabeth, to be in fact, that your insanely ticklish. So, wanna see how ticklish you are?" Percy's eyes widen, and he vegans to struggle to try and get away. Luke lifts his foot again into Percy's armpits, filled with light tufts of hair, and his hand in the other. Lightly wiggling his fingers and toes, Percy begins to violently trash around, tryingto break the bounds. "mphpmahapahmapahamahapa!" he screams under his gag. A single tear slides down his cheek, and gets lost under the ducttape. Luke takes his foot down and uses both his fingers and wiggled them in Percy's ticklish armpits. "Does this tickle Posideons widdle boy!? Daddy's not here to save you now is he?" "MpHMPHMPH.!" Which meant something like please stop, but Luke was just getting started. He moved his wiggling fingers to his toothbrush, turned it on, andput it in Percy's armpit. "phahapahamapahahapamahapahaastpahaphapsh!!!" "Never." He switched from armpit toarmpit for about ten minutes. Then he went down to his hips. Luke straddled on Percy's hips, and began to dig his fingers into Percy's ribs and sides. "Stupid Percy, you could have kept your mouth shut but you didn't. Well too bad. " Luke jumped off Percy's bed and moved down to his thighs. "I'm gonna enjoy this." he said with a smile.
11121.title: His ARMPITS and sides!

111211.content: Luke then went to his thighs."Mphphhpmmh?"Percy looked scared and confused."Time to tickle!"MOPPPPHPHPHMMPOMPOPMHPMHPMHMOHPMHPMPHMOP!""I'm getting kind of bored of your muffled screams."Luke says taking off the tape and such with the scissors."Let me go!Luke if I get out of here I'm going toHAHAHAAHA!"He was shut up with Luke gicing him a tickle in his bellybutton.Being 12 years old percy wasn't srong enough to get out but he was plenty ticklish."here we go!"Luke said now tickling Percy's calves."STAHAHAAHAHAHAHAAAHAHAHPANNAHAHAAHABBEEBEHEHEHEHEHEHTH!""Cal ling your little girlfriend.Well there's no use.She's on a hike with Thalia so ha!""Luke I'm sorry I mean you did deserve it.""It's to late for that!You got me kicked out of camp for a month!Now it's time for my revenge!"Luke said now tickling under his knees."HAHAHAHAAHHAAHAAHHSTAHAHAAHAAHAHAAAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHPPLHEHEHEEHEHEHEHEHE EHSICANT THAAHAHAHEKIHEHEHEEHHEHEEHEHE!"There was then a knock on the door."Percy I need to ask you something."It was Annabeth!"ANNAMPH!"Luke put his hand over Percy's mouth.After a while Annabeth finally said,"Hmm no one is home.Maybe I should......"

1112111.content: "What a minute...What was that?"Now hearing Percy's muffled screams.She tries to look in the window but the blinds were closed."Hmm..Wierd.The doors locked.Maybe I'll just...."She starts picking the lock."And there!"The door swungs open."Anmph!""It seems to becoming from his room."She ran in thereseeing Percy tied up to his bed and Luke covering his mouth.Luke took it off."Percy!Luke what are you doing?""He wahas tiheckling mehehe make him stop, please.He's been tickling me for an hour.I can't take much more."Annabeth pondered a thought and finally said,"Luke, why are you tickling him?""Because he told them that I stole the bolt!I was kicked out for a month!""Oh thats why you were gone.""Can you get me out of here!"Percy said waiting for Annabeth to let him out."Nope.""WHAT!Don't you tickle me too.I won't be able to take it.""I want to see how ticklish you are."Then it happened.Annabeth went to his armpits and Luke went to his feet."HAHAAAHAAHAHAHAAHAHEHEHEEHEEHEHEHEHEHEHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHHAAHAH!"Per cy was thrashing violently.His face turned as red as a tomato with embarrassment considering how much he liked Annabeth."STHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAPPLHEHEEHEEHSHEHEANNAHAHAAHAAHAHBEHEHEEHEEHEH EHEEHEHEH!"They both stopped."Wow Percy you are really ticklish.Now what can we do?""We can use the tools or we can switch positions."Percy was still giggling in between words and breathes."Plhehese stahap.I cahahan't take much more of thheehse.""Nope so what do you want to do then Luke?"

11121112.title: Annabeth at the tummy and Luke at the armpits

choices: Luke keeps tickling poor Percy and Annabeth and Clarisse join in!
111211121.content:
Clarisse took place at Percy's poor underarms. Annabeth moved to his feet, and Luke moved to his belly.
This was far worse than anything poor Percy had felt before. All his most ticklish spots were being tickled with no mercy.
Annabeth ran five fingers on the arches of each foot. Luke was digging into his belly button. Clarisse had found an extra electric toothbrush and was diggin both under his arms.
"PLEHEHEHEHEHAHAHAHAHAHSEEEEEEEE STOPAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!" Percy yelled as loud as he could as he was being tickled. But they didn't let in.
Percy lost track of time. All he could think of was how horrible it was. He was hating every moment of this. Why did he have to be so ticklish? Why couldn't he be one of those people who weren't really ticklish? Why did he of ALL the campers have to be the most ticklish?
He tried to suck in his belly to escape Luke's wiggling finger, but Luke straddled his waist and said, "I've got your belly button. What are you gonna do about it now?" He smiled evily. Percy's belly button was one of his msot ticklish spots. Thank the gods they were't tickling his ribs along with everywhere else. His ribs was his worst spot of all.
Finally they all stopped.
"Hmmm." Luke said. "Annabeth, where is he most ticklish?"
Annabeth looked like she didn't want to tell.
Percy quickly prayed to his father that she wouldn't say it.
"I'm not sure." She said. Percy sent a million thank you's up to his father to to Annabeth with a certain look. She nodded as if to say "I helped you with that one thing, Seaweed Brain."
Luke believed her. "We'll just have to find out." He tied the gag back in my mouth.
"Luke, maybe he's had enough..." Annabeth said.
Luke stood up and walked over to her. "Would you like to join him?"
I shook my head telling her NOT to join me. To run and get help. But I ahd a feeling we both knew Luke would catch her before she reached help.
Luke turned back.
"So, Jackson, where are you most ticklish?" He said.
He started under my arms. I began to laugh behind the gag.
He moved down to my hips, pinching and poking. It actually wasn't that ticklish.
He squeezed my sides and I laughed. I was really sweating now.
I knew he was about to find out. He was about to move up and tickle my ribs.
Clarisse and Annabeth stood off to the side watching. Luke moved his hands up to my ribs.
"MHMMMHMMMMPPPMMHHHHMMMPPPMMMHHMM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!" I screamed. it was supposed to be more of a "No, please anywhere but there, I beg you!" But the gag prevented it.
Luke smiled evily.
"We've struck gold."
He dug in to each of my rib cages, making me go mad...
111211121.title: Pits

Before Percy could respond, Jason kept forword and dug his nails into Percy's sides.

Percy laughed loudly as Jason tortured him.

Jason then...

1121111.content:
As soon as the vines freed him Nico charged at Percy pining him at a nearby tree with his arms above his head. “tell me Percy are you ticklish?” Nico asked, “like I would tell you!” Nico shrugged “suit yourself I’ll just found out myself” and with that he dig his fingers to the t-shirt clad sides of the older demigod making him giggle “hahaheheheheheheh” when the younger teen hit between the second and third rip Percy wend ballistic “HAHAHAHAH” “sweet spot hum?” Nico teased his victim “STAHHHAHAPPHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH” the son of poison begged.

“well Percy you used these vines to hold me down now is time for ME to retire the favor” and with that he put away his hand from the brunette wrist but they could not go down the nature spirts where holding them up “well now let’s begin the real payback” the teen said menacingly as he pull Percy’s shirt over his head exposing his upper body leaving him completely defenseless at any attacks the vengeful demigod has instore for him “hey Jackson where are most ticklish?” Nico asked him “and why should I tell you that?” the demigod of the seas asked his captor “I’ll make you a deal you tell me your two most ticklish spots and I’ll tickle them for 15 minutes or you be stubborn and I tickle you till I find them and then tickling you here for five hour straight what you say your chose”.
Percy thought about it on the on hand if he did tell Nico could go back at his word and torture him at his most ticklish spots for hours to no end, at the other if he did not tell gods know how much time would it take him to find them and hid did not want to have his most sensitive spots tickled for five hou-

“tick toc Percy time’s running out” the brunette said clawing his fingers close to the demigod’s sides “W-WAIT I’LL TELL YOU!!!” Percy screamed “see you only to co-operate now spilt it” “ how you want me to tell you first to last or to start at the bottom up” the demigod tried to stall “bottom up and hurry my patient ending!” Nico said angrily “o-okay it goes like that my third spot is my ribs my second is my belly button and I am most ticklish at my pits” the young man send embarked oh gods why could he be one o those guys who weren’t ticklish but no he own sensitivity was his worst enemy. “HAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA” Percy’s train of thoughts where cut short by an attack as his rib cage by Nico’s evil fingers making laugh like a little girl.
Percy had to addict that Nico was an excellent digging gently into the ribs into the ribs not hurting him one bit only making laugh “HAHAHAHAHASTAHAHAHAHPHHAHAHAPLAEHAHAHSEEHHEHAHH”.
Then he stated at the sweet spot just between the second and third rib massaging it scratching it never failing to make Percy scream.

“NIHHHHHCOOOOHHHAHAPLEAHSHAHHASSTOOHOOHPHAHAHHAHAHAIHAHAHCANTHAHAHTAHAHHAK ETI” “can’t take what Percy boy?” the evil teen said griming like the devil teasing his squiring victim making him laugh even more then he stated climbing the ribs up playing with and going extremely close to the demigod sensitive pits but he stayed away from them thankful staying away from then.
All too soon for Nico’s taste the first 15 minutes where up and he removed the fingers from the ribs letting the older teen to catch his breath “wow you sure can scream Percy and that your third most ticklish spot!? I wonder what’s going to handed when I get to your pits I better gaga you or the whole camp might here us!!” the pale teen joked.

Percy did not answer him, he was too busy trying to catch his breath and considering his sad state his eyes had tears in them almost ready to fall and his lean body was coved in a light layer of sweat and he felt his face hurt from all the laughing he was going through and Nico was right that was only his third most ticklish spot how was going to react when he gets his pit? I‘m going to pass out he though.

“Catch your breath yet?” the black-haired teen asked” “ Please Nico stop you had your fun now let me out” the older teen pleaded with his captor “we had a deal Percy and I must held my end of it” and with that he put his finger at Percy’s shallow belly button drilling at the hard muscles around the ticklish flesh “NOOOHAHAHAHAHAHAPLEALAAHAHAHSHAHAHAHAHSTOPPAPAHAHAHA” the green eyed demigod was already screaming from the attack at his very ticklish innie “HAHAHAHAHIIHHHCAHHHNTHAHAHTAKEHHAHAHAITANYMOOOHOHOHOREHHAHAHHA” the teen pleaded and indeed Nico withdraw from the sensitive skin “’gasp’ thank ‘gasp’ you” “don’t thank me yet” Nico said with a mad grin at his face as put his finger into his mouth and then putting back at the belly button reusing the torture worse that ever “NOOOAHAHANAHAAHAHAHAHAAHSTOOHHHAHHAPAHAH” the raven haired teen could not believe he was brought down by something so childish as tickling but here it was becoming a sobbing mess as soon as some touched him he felt so embarrassed.

Nico gave him another sort break and asked him “hey Percy do you know what a raspberry is?” “you mean the fruit?” Percy said confused where do raspberries fit here? Nico only laughed “No the fruit but don’t worry you will learn soon enough” “ah? what do you meAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAHAHA” Percy’s question was cut as the other demigod put his moth at his belly blowing raspberry after raspberry at the ticklish hole sending poor Percy into ticklish tears “HAHAHAHAHPLEASEAHAHAHAHSTOOOOHHHHHPPHHHTHIS TORTURE!!!!!” the brunette screamed as his second most ticklish spot was abused.

Again the 15 minutes passed way too soon for Nico’s taste, but he had to keep his word again and stopped both to give the other teen some time to recover and to look at his state. He whole body was covered in sweat and tears where streaming down his eyes this was not a hero, right know he was a very ticklish boy at the mercy of a very sadistic cousin whose out to take revenge and he can not escape not matter what he does and that terrified the trapped teen more that he was willing to admit.

Nico on the other had was at cloud nine finally after the death of his sister he was happy, yes he felt a little guilt for torturing Percy like that but he had stated it so it was fair!. “ready for the final round?” he asked his captive “NO” Percy screamed “ my pits are my most ticklish spot if you tickle here am going to die Nico! I can’t take it anymore stop please!!” the son of Poseidon pleaded but Nico had already made his mind up “Percy again we had an agreement and intend to fulfill it, expect if you want me to tickle you more” “NO NO more I’ll shut up okay” and Nico laughed “you know what I’ll give you another choice I can gag you now with your own socks and take five minutes out of your pit torture or I could leave you un-gagged and have the full 15”.

Percy once again though about tasting his own socks would be awful especially now by how sweaty he was but they could shorten his torture “fine gag me” the younger teen only smirked and wend down at Percy’s feet and removed his shoes removing a pair of very sweaty and smelly socks he used them to make a makeshift gag and put it at the young demigods mouth silencing him “now let’s go for the final round”
Nico finally took a look at his victims pits for the very first time, they covered by a layer of soft brown hair in contrast too the hairless upper body of the teen and they looked to be very ticklish indeed so he wasted no time and run his fingers of both hands thourh the pits making poor poor ticklish Percy scream at his gag “MPHPHMPHMHPHHAMPPMAANAPAHPAHAMAPAHPMHPAHMPAHMPHAMHMPHMPHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAPMAMPHP HMH” this was the worst torture he ever had he would gladly took all of titans instead of this but here he was helpless and with no escape at those evil finges that here tickling the most ticklish part of his body making him cry tears of laughter.

Nico used a variety of tactics to get to the teenager demigod such as putting his fingers at the base of his armpits and started drilling through the hairs “MPHPMHMMPHAPMPHMPAPHMAPAHMHPMHPHMAPHAMHAPHMHMPAHPM” next he pocket at random places at the pits making the other brunette jump at his restrains then he started at the place where the breast met the pit “MPHHMAHPMHAMPHAMPHAPMAHMPHPMHAPMHAPMHAPHAM” The other demigod screamed into his gag. “And now for the finale” Nico said and dig his fingers deep into the hairy underarms going straight form their center and the poor tortured teen screeched into his socks “MPHPMPHPMHMPHHAHANHAPAPNHHPNHPAHNAMAHPMHHPMHPHMHPMH” the raven head hit gold and continue to torture the center Percy’s pits for the remaking of the 5 minutes they were left.

When the torture was over Percy was exhausted his whole body was covered in sweaty which helped his captor at his torture, tears where streaming down his face, his face was red form laughing and his moth was dry. Nico took pity on him and make the nature spirts release him and removed the gag. “learned your lesson?” “ooh yes am not going to tickle you again I promise you are completely evil when coming to revenge” Percy said and Nico laughed the other teen laughed also “why are you laughing?” “at least your no longer sad” he said, and Nico realized that it was true he was happy “guess I am” and both teens learned something that day Nico that sometimes your friends can make you laugh even at your lowest and Percy… well he leared to never messed up with the son of Hades!!!.

112112.title: Keep tickling

choices: tickle his ribs!(second most ticklish spot!)
11212.content:
Percy lifted up Nico's shirt revealing his ribs and belly. Percy dug his fingers into Nico's sides making him shake with laughter. Percy moved up to his ribs, poking each one making Nico squeal in a high pitched voice.
"Perhahahahacy!!!! Let me gohahahahaaaa!!!" He yelled.
"Not until your happy!" Percy laughed.
Percy then began to slowly make circles on Nico's heaving stomach getting closer to the young demigod's navel. Just before Percy's finger entered his belly button, Nico's stomach tensed like he was about to freak out.
Percy then began swirling his long finger in Nico's belly button.
"NOHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!" Nico screamed out.
Percy kept tickling Nico's belly button until he was crying.
"Okay I'll let you have a break." He said, stopping. He still had to figure out where Nicos' most ticklish spot was.
Percy turned to make sure no one was watching but when he turned back around Nico had escaped and lunged on him, pinning him down.
"HA! Now I've got you!" Nico smiled evily.
"No, Nico, you don't want to do this." Percy said. He knew he was extremely ticklish. His most ticklish spot was on the belly button and he knew Nico would target it because he had tickled Nico there.
"It's my turn!"
The nature spirits came back and helped Nico hold down Percy.
"Now, how's that belly button?" Nico said.
"N-no. Nico. Don't d-do this!" Percy stuttered.
"What? You can't possibly be SCARED!" nico grinned.
With that he began to tickle Percy's inbetweenie belly button making him go mad.
Percy wondered how he could be so ticklish there. He hated it. He hated not being able to do anything about being tickled by Nico. Nico stopped after ten minutes and let Percy have a small break.
"Now, should i..."

Leo and Jason had just come back from a long day. Leo and Jason had both taken off their shoes. Leo's orange socks hit the wooden for of the cabin as he walked towards his bed. Jason made his way to his bed, which was beside Leo's. Jason would usually spend the night at Leo's since it got pretty lonely at cabin 1. Jason was curious about Leo. Leo wouldn't let Jason touch his feet, neck or side. Jason was starting to wonder why.

"So, Leo, how was today!"

"It was fun, but my feet are killing me!" Leo said.

"Wanna watch a movie?"

"Sure"

Jason had sat on Leo's bed and thirty minutes in Leo was into the movie. Making sure Leo want looking. He took his finger and stopped Leo's left socked foot. Leo's foot twitched. Jason did it again, but with two fingers. Leo turned his head and see what Jason we doing.

"Stop it! That actually tickles."

Jason smirks and continues to tickle his foot. Leo started to giggle. Jason smirks then...

115111.content:
In one fluid motion, Jason pounced on Leo, and flipped him over. He sat right on Leo's back, and grabbed both of his feet in a headlock with one arm, and pinned them to his chest. Due to Leo's small frame, this was easy for Jason to do, and impossible for Leo to turn or buck him off.

Leo had a feeling he knew what was coming.
"Dude! What'r you doing?!"

He couldn't see it, but he could practically feel Jason grinning ear to ear.

"Oooh, you'll see."

Jason took hold of Leo's right foot with his other hand, and slowly started peeling the orange sock off of it. First came the heel, and then the arch was revealed.
It was here that Leo flew into a blind panic.

"Nonononono! Jason don't! Please man, I'm REALLY ticklish! Leave my socks alone!"

Leo clenched his toes as hard as he could to try and prevent Jason from removing his socks, but all his efforts were futile. Jason easily removed the fabric, followed swiftly by the left one, leaving Leo's feet bare.
Jason took a moment to appreciate the view. Leo's feet were gorgeous. The toes were perfectly formed, and the arch was low, nearly to the point of being flat footed. Jason could tell just by looking that they were pillow soft.

Jason became aware of Leo squirming underneath him. Wasting no more time, Jason...

121112.content:
"Percy! Please don't!" Annabeth screamed. "Oh no, and let my prey get away? I don't think so..." he grinned evilly.
"At least take me back to the cabin!!" Annabeth pleaded. Percy frowned, as if he was getting an idea. "Oh alright. But you must face the consequence!" He whispered.
"OK." Annabeth's voice trembled.

Back in their cabin, Percy asked, "Annabeth, would you please tell me where your most ticklish spot is?"
"my stomach, ribs, and sides..." She replied nervously. "then please take off your top and if you have one on, bra."
Annabeth stripped of her shirt and bra. "Lie on the bed, sweetie," Percy smirked.

Percy left the room and got two electric brushes, two feathers, five baby oil bottles, and five pillows.
Once he came back, he tied her arms and legs spread eagle.
He grinned evilly and started gently running his fingers over her smooth stomach.
"EEEEEEK no hehehehehe!!! Annabeth gasped.
Percy gently dug his fingers in her sides.
"NOOOOOO HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!!"
Percy smiled and jumped on the bed.
He started licking her stomach, which was heaving.
"AHHHHHHHHH!! NOOOOOO!"
He took the feather and ran it gently across her perfectly shaped breasts.
Annabeth gasped and squealed with laughter.

Percy ran the feather all over her, smirking.
Annabeth was laughing so hard, she was silent.

After a while, Percy let her have a quick break, before starting again.

He tickled her sides, and she giggled and raised her stomach.
s she raised her stomach, Percy stuffed a pillow under neath her, making her ever so ticklish stomach very vulnerable.

Percy poured all of the baby oil on her upper body, making it smooth and creamy, just perfect for tickling.
He grabbed an electric toothbrush and switched it on. Then he traced it all over her body.
She laughed so hard, her trousers (pants) began to feel wet!
"Percy, please stop. It's killing me!" Annabeth groaned.
Percy stopped, with a sigh.
"Just remember, be a good girl with me!"Percy breathed.
He let her out of the restraints.
Percy queried,"Did you enjoy that?"
Annabeth responded, "yes, but I'll get you back!!"
Before going to bed, they kissed good night.

info.brief_description: Have fun tickling the characters of Percy Jackson and the Olympians
info.description:
This Fanfiction contains stories about the characters from Percy Jackson and the Olympians and the situations in which they get tickled. This is a book published by Disney Hyperion and written by Rick Riordan.

Please add on as much as you like, while still abiding by the following rules:
- Please keep it PG
- No nudity
- No Sex
- No killing

Thank You and enjoy
